name: Forest (itch) (skillakilla)
description:
v0.1.1

Forest is a badly put together horror game made in the very limited coding platform scratch. This game is only in beta so don't expect much.

Warning! there are jump scares but mainly It's a bad game and should be played by no one

Update notes
